definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

sentences.english: This paper studied the antiseptic and fresh- keeping technology of pasteurized neutral milk beverage.
sentences.chinese: 研究了巴氏殺菌中性乳飲料的防腐保鮮技術。

sentences.english: Buy only pasteurized egg products that bear the USDA inspection mark.
sentences.chinese: 只買農業部檢查標記過的巴氏殺菌蛋。

sentences.english: HMF was produced after heating, especially in pasteurizing after filling.
sentences.chinese: HMF是在熱處理後產生，特別是灌裝後巴氏殺菌。

sentences.english: The final key component of the pasteurization system is the holding tube.
sentences.chinese: 巴氏殺菌設備的最後一個關鍵組成部分是保溫管。

sentences.english: We are learning that pasteurization can be used for colostrum also.
sentences.chinese: 我們瞭解到巴氏殺菌法也可用於初乳的消毒。

sentences.english: Gears are weatherproofed and Babbit sprockets may be applied.
sentences.chinese: 齒輪抗大氣腐蝕的，並且可以應用巴氏合金鏈輪。

sentences.english: In this paper, the antisepsis and fresh-keeping technology for pasteurized neutral milk beverages is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了巴氏殺菌中性乳飲料的防腐保鮮技術。

sentences.english: Ebbinghaus accepts associationism but Bartlett is against it.
sentences.chinese: 艾氏接受聯想主義，而巴氏反對之。

sentences.english: The hollow bearing of normal mill adopts Babbitt alloy bush and oil lubrication.
sentences.chinese: 常規磨機中空軸承用巴氏合金軸瓦，爲稀油潤滑。

sentences.english: Pasteurized milk is curdled at 90 degrees F and the curd is cut.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶採用巴氏法滅菌，在華氏90度凝結並切割凝乳。

sentences.english: It isn’t destroyed by human digestion. And pasteurization is no help.
sentences.chinese: 它不僅破壞人體消化，而且巴氏殺菌法對其無效。

sentences.english: At the same time the promotion of Pakistan's dairy industry development is of great significance.
sentences.chinese: 同時對促進我國巴氏奶產業的發展具有重大意義。

sentences.english: Pap stain is better for Gyn-cytology to identfy abnormality.
sentences.chinese: 觀察宮頸細胞學病變，用巴氏染色較好。

sentences.english: Milk is pasteurised and dairy products are safe for consumption.
sentences.chinese: 巴氏牛奶和奶製品是安全食用。
所有的蛋製品都是用巴氏殺菌法處理的嗎？

sentences.english: It was studied in this paper that pasteurized milk's shelf-life can be extended by adding lactoferrin.
sentences.chinese: 本文對添加乳鐵蛋白延長巴氏奶貯存時間進行了研究。

definition: Louis Pasteur (1822-1895), French chemist and microbiologist
to pass to the next generation
Mr Gram/Dr. Hans Christian Jaochim Gram (1953-1938), Danish doctor and inventor of the Gram stain 革蘭氏染色法|革兰氏染色法
